Articles.Content:
Hi all. I made hatch in Unity, and made it right. But when I want to go in EVA, there appears "Can't exit, hatch is obstructed".

It's has height like Mk1-2 pod.

Edited August 25, 2012 by Navy4422
Removed questionable link

Hi all. I made hatch in Unity, and made it right. But when I want to go in EVA, there appears "Can't exit, hatch is obstructed".

EDIT URL DELETED

It's has height like Mk1-2 pod.

Please use a different image site! There are children on these forums you know.

Edited August 25, 2012 by Navy4422
Dang. Some of these sites just don't show their evil faces when accessed from Russia. As I click the link I see an image of a pod only, no adult content at all...

Yeah, I would recommend using a different image host too. Best to not expose the sites younger members to that stuff.

As far as the hatch goes make sure that its not intersecting any of the models mesh, it looks pretty close from what I could tell from the pic. Also I think the airlock box needs to be larger, try scaling it up so its big enough to fit a Kerbal in it. It may be possible to have them work and be smaller, but I have never been able to get small airlock boxes to work correctly.

Edited August 25, 2012 by chickenplucker

Having hatch problems, huh?

If I were Gus Grissom, I'd say, "Tell me about it!"
How did you solve it? I'm having hatch problems too: http://i.imgur.com/te2ya.png

Can some one please help me with this before i jump of my balcony so my airlock does not work. it says hatch obstructed. it worked earlyer but i tried to ad a ladder and the i got the error. and even if i undid the ladder still the problem stayed. so what am i doing wrong? HELP
